generated_description: i wish u sun, legally known as iwishusun ltd., is a charity label based in berlin, germany, dedicated to fighting blindness. the company aims to provide treatable eye diseases with appropriate health provisions and financial support where available. iwishusun releases new, high-quality products at irregular intervals and collaborates with designers and manufacturers to create exclusive items. for every product sold, a cataract operation or a pair of glasses for a schoolchild in bangladesh is funded through its partner organization, orbis international. all profits from iwishusun go directly to charity. the company was founded in november 2012 by patrick andrist and cathy boom, who also collaborate with orbis to support their mission.
